# Code and Scrapped Table
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
# install.packages("rvest")
library(rvest)


### Assignment 4
url2 <- 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_dates_predicted_for_apocalyptic_events'
#Reading the HTML code from the Wiki website
wikifaiapo <- read_html(url2)
class(wikifaiapo)

failedapopred <- wikifaiapo %>%
  html_nodes(xpath='//*[@id="mw-content-text"]/div[1]/table[1]') %>%
  html_table()
class(failedapopred)
failedapopred_tab = failedapopred[[1]]
failedapopred_tab = failedapopred_tab[, c(1:3)]

write.csv(failedapopred_tab, "assets/scrapped Assignment 4 Table.csv", row.names = FALSE)

print(failedapopred_tab, width = Inf)

```
